Name: Objective

Options.Description: Korali will find the point of minimum evaluation of the provided model.
Korali will find the point of maximum evaluation of the provided model.

Configuration Settings.Description: Indicates whether Korali will minimize or maximize the objective evaluation.

Name: Constraints
Configuration Settings.Description: Stores constraints to the objective function.

Name: Lower Bound
Variables Configuration.Description: Specifies the lower bound for the variable's value.

Name: Upper Bound
Variables Configuration.Description: Specifies the upper bound for the variable's value.

Name: Granularity
Variables Configuration.Description: Specifies the granularity of a discrete variable, a granularity of 1.0 means that the variable can only take values in (.., -1.0, 0.0, +1.0, +2.0, ..) where the levels are set symmetric around the initial mean (here 0.0).

Name: Has Discrete Variables
Internal Settings.Description: Flag indicating if at least one of the variables is discrete.
